description: The Apple iPad Mini Slim Book PU leather Case by i-Blason -- Custom designed for Apple iPad Mini /iPad Mini with Retina Display. This case features a combination of functionality and style. Built for best in class material = Light Weight and DurabilityNOTE: THIS IS FOR THE ORIGINAL IPAD MINI RELEASED IN 2012 AND ALSO COMPATIBLE WITH IPAD MINI WITH RETINA DISPLAY (2ND GENERATION, 2013 RELEASE)FEATURES:-- Auto wake and put iPad Mini to sleep function compatible / smart cover design-- Super slim light weight profile/i-Blason signature premium patent leather exterior-- Flipstand for movie watching-- Magnetic closure (Easy to open and secure closure)-- Business / credit card slot-- Elastic Hand strap for secure handling-- Built-in pen holder with bonus stylus pen-- All i-Blason Tablet Protective Accessories Comes with i-Blason 3 Year Limited Warranty. i-Blason LLC is the Only Authorized Distributor of Original i-Blason (TM) Product. Purchases from Unauthorized Source will Not be Covered by Our Warranty.
title: i-BLASON Apple iPad Mini / iPad mini with Retina Display Auto Wake / Sleep Smart Cover Leather Case (Elastic Hand Strap, Multi-Angle, Card Holder) With Bonus Stylus (Multi-Color to Choose From) 3 Year Warranty (Black)
